scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs 'Meemoo Za Sadda' with Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare on the main stage.
A cinematic transition scene where Pekora and her guests drive through a neon city while singing.
The grand finale of the song on stage with all performers and visual effects.
Post-live ending screen with a final audio sign-off from Pekora.
